text: Thomas Dawson Bell (3 December 1884 – 6 March 1951) was an English professional footballer who played as an inside forward. ==References== Category:1884 births Category:1951 deaths Category:People from Stanley, County Durham Category:English footballers Category:Association football inside forwards Category:West Stanley F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Scunthorpe United F.C. players Category:Cleethorpes Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Thomas Bell (footballer, born 1884)
